SELECT A.SEQ_ID,B.SEQ_ID AS PRODUCT_SEQ_ID,B.PRODUCT_CODE,B.PRODUCT_NAME,B.TITLE,A.PRICE_SCOPE,A.AMOUNT,A.INVENTORY,B.STATUS,B.CREATE_TIME FROM PM_PRODUCT_LIST A LEFT JOIN PM_PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_SEQ_ID=B.SEQ_ID WHERE A.IS_VALID=1
AND B.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE '%${productCodeS}%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%${productNameS}%'
